In Barcelona but wishing you were in New York or San Francisco?  This is the place for you.  Nice service, nice food, by far the most expensive we have encountered in Barcelona -- and little local flavor.  Friends recommended it and my spouse really wanted to try it.  It was fine but a dumb way to spend an evening in Barcelona.  If you are here for two weeks and get homesick in the middle and feel like you are not spending enough, come here.   Food is first-rate, service is nice.
